text: Yas'aluka 'Ahlu Al-Kitabi 'An Tunazzila `Alayhim Kitabaan Mina As-Sama'i Faqad Sa'alu Musa 'Akbara Min Dhalika Faqalu 'Arina Allaha Jahratan Fa'akhadhat/humu As-Sa`iqatu Bizulmihim Thumma Attakhadhu Al-`Ijla Min Ba`di Ma Ja'at/humu Al-Bayyinatu Fa`afawna `An Dhalika Wa 'Atayna Musa Sultanaan Mubinaan
